title: string (Main title of the edition, max 60 chars)
author: string (Optional: Author name, defaults to 'Pretheesh')
summary: string (Optional: Alternative summary if cover is missing)

cover.title: string (Optional: Title for the intro slide, max 40 chars)
cover.summary: string (Required if cover exists: Summary text for the intro slide, max 180 chars)
cover.imageUrl: string (Optional: Background image URL for the intro slide)

articles.url: string (External link to the full article)
articles.title: string (Headline, max 80 chars)
articles.fullSummary: string (Detailed summary, max 400 chars recommended for UI)
